take a dirty plates and bowls wash in sink.

take tomatoes in bowl into stoveknob and serve it bowl and spoon.

take a water in the pot and put on stove knob the boil water was ready.
take cracked egg and throw in bin
clear the fridge of all food
First take a potato and wash it. Cut potato into slices using knife. Transfer sliced potatoes in to a bowl. Bake the potatoes in the microwave oven at desired temperature.
Firstly take a clean cup. Open the wine bottle and pour required quantity of wine in to the cup.
Take food which is to be kept into fridge. Open the fridge door, keep the food into fridge and close the fridge door.
Take a clean cup. Take the water mug and pour required water into the cup.
Retrieve potato. Get the pot. Wash off the potato. Place potato in pot. Go to the sink. Turn on the faucet. Fill the pot with water. Turn off the faucet.
Take all unused apple slices and throw them into the bin.
Take all the kitchen utensils (knife, butter knife, spatula, fork etc) to be kept inside the drawer. Open the drawer, keep all the utensils inside the drawer and then close the drawer.
